verses.name: 2 Timothy 1:15
verses.text: This thou knowest, that all they which are in Asia be turned away from me; of whom are Phygellus and Hermogenes.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 1:16
verses.text: The Lord give mercy unto the house of Onesiphorus; for he oft refreshed me, and was not ashamed of my chain:

verses.name: 2 Timothy 1:17
verses.text: But, when he was in Rome, he sought me out very diligently, and found me.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 1:18
verses.text: The Lord grant unto him that he may find mercy of the Lord in that day: and in how many things he ministered unto me at Ephesus, thou knowest very well.
